alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL BRADFORD... NORTHWESTERN CLAY AND SOUTHWESTERN DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cecil Field to near Starke. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Middleburg, Cecil Field, Maxville, Kingsley, Camp Blanding, Baldwin, Lawtey, and Whitehouse Air Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
